item.description:
SPECIAL UPDATE!!!

We have a special guest: Yuval Malinsky, (Chair, Board of Directors of New England Israel Business Council and CEO of Vigorous Mind in his spare time) will tell us about Governor Deval Patrick's recent MA trade mission to israel and the upcoming Mass Challenge here in MA.

Foreign Exchanges, Database Virtuzalization, and Cutting edge network management, cullminate in this trifecta! Join the TechAviv founders club in MA to spotlight three amazing entrepreneurs and their companies. Scalebase and Centerity are new to the scene, and Currensee will demo what they've been up to since we last saw them (hint: about $2Billion in transactions).

March Presenters: 

Special Guest - NEIBC - Yuval Malinsky - Chair @ NEIBC & CEO @ Vigorous Mind
1) Scalebase - Liran Zelkha - Co-Founder & VP Sales (@scalebase) 
2) Centerity - Roi Keren - CEO (@centerity)
3) Currensee - Asaf Yigal - Co-Founder & VP Product (@currensee)

When & Where: 
MIT 
Building E51 - Room 345 
70 Memorial Drive 
Cambridge, MA

Agenda: 
6:30pm-7:00pm Networking & Intros (Pizza) 
7:00pm-8:00pm Product Demos, Group Q&A, Voting 
8:00pm-8:30pm Member Announcements & Networking

Looking to hire top Israeli talent? 
Post free on the TechAviv Job Board

Thanks to our Sponsors 
The Boston TechAviv Founders Club is made possible because we have great sponsors. Special thanks to: 
Nixon Peabody and are new sponsor ExchangeGuru!

Sponsorship Opportunities 
Please email Gil or Yaron if you are interested or know somebody who is interested in sponsoring the Boston branch or global TechAviv Founders Club.

See you soon!

Gil & Yaron 
@giljzim 
@YaronSamid 
@TechAviv 
www.techaviv.com
item.why: 2011 on it's way and we're mixing it up with a couple of new startups and a special TechAviv Alumni appearance! Special guest from the NEIBC will tell us about Governor Deval Patrick's recent MA trade mission to israel and upcomin Mass Challenge.
item.name: TechAviv MA March 2011 Meetup
